mapper.select: SELECT * FROM psychology_base.subject_type ORDER BY update_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO psychology_base.subject_type (id, name, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, version) VALUES (#{subjectType.id}, #{subjectType.name}, #{subjectType.createBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{subjectType.updateBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE psychology_base.subject_type SET name = #{subjectType.name}, update_by = #{subjectType.updateBy}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), version = #{subjectType.version} + 1 WHERE id = #{subjectType.id} AND version = #{subjectType.version}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM psychology_base.subject_type WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version}
